quarks.samples.apps.mqtt

Class AbstractMqttApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.samples.apps.AbstractApplication
      • quarks.samples.apps.mqtt.AbstractMqttApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeviceCommsApp, SensorAnalyticsApplication

    public abstract class AbstractMqttApplication
extends AbstractApplication
    An MQTT Application base class.

    Application instances need to:

    • define an implementation for AbstractApplication.buildTopology(Topology)
    • call AbstractApplication.run() to build and submit the topology for execution.

    The class provides some common processing needs:

    • Support for an external configuration file
    • Provides a TopologyProviderFactory
    • Provides a ApplicationUtilities
    • Provides a MqttDevice

    • Method Detail

      • preBuildTopology

        protected void preBuildTopology(Topology t)
        Description copied from class: AbstractApplication
        A hook for a subclass to do things prior to the invocation of AbstractApplication.buildTopology(Topology).

        The default implementation is a no-op.

        Overrides:
        preBuildTopology in class AbstractApplication
        Parameters:
        t - the application's topology

      • getCommandValueString

        public java.lang.String getCommandValueString(com.google.gson.JsonObject jo)
        Extract a simple string valued command arg from a MqttDevice.commands(String...) returned JsonObject tuple.

        Interpret the JsonObject's embedded payload as a JsonObject with a single "value" property.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the command's argument value
